lines.text: [Marty has sarcastically claimed to be Michael J. Fox]

[To Marty]
You DO sorta look like that J. Michael Fox guy.
You know, you could get into a lot of trouble by going back in time to see your relatives. I should know.
Holy bovine!
See you in the future!
Holy Marconi!
And cheese!
Oucha magoucha!
Is there a Tannen in EVERY century?
What could possibly happen to us?
Marty, you remember what happened to the Wicked Witch of the West in The Wizard of Oz?
Yeah.
We won't be so lucky!
What a world!
Now then, peasant, prepare to meet your ancestors!
I do quite often, but thanks for the invitation!
Golden fluid produced by the apis mellifera. I'm home.
Oh, Emmett, I love it when you call me "honey".
Phew! That was a close one! If it weren't for lightning power, Marty would have been trapped in 1955 forever, or at least until 1956.
Emmett Lathrop Brown. Scientist, husband and father - or just another name for disaster?
